name: oodikone
description: An application for analyzing university data.

scripts.docker:down: ./run.sh both anon down --remove-orphans; ./run.sh both real down --remove-orphans
scripts.testupdater: docker-compose --file docker-compose.ci.yml up --detach --no-recreate sis-updater-worker && SCHEDULE_IMMEDIATE=weekly EXIT_AFTER_IMMEDIATES=yes docker-compose --file docker-compose.ci.yml run sis-updater-scheduler npm start
scripts.install:local: npm i && npm i --prefix services/shared && npm i --prefix services/frontend && npm i --prefix services/backend && npm i --prefix updater/sis-updater-scheduler && npm i --prefix updater/sis-updater-worker
scripts.install:docker: docker exec frontend npm i && docker exec oodikone_backend_1 npm i && docker exec sis-updater-scheduler npm i && docker exec oodikone_sis-updater-worker_1 npm i
scripts.install:both: npm run install:local && npm run install:docker
